overview: A seasoned financial executive with over 20 years experience, Mr. Erik Miller has been the senior financial executive in many successful technology companies, having raised significant amounts of private equity and has listed two companies on the NASDAQ. He most recently served as CFO at SigNav Pty. Ltd and Tangler Pty. Ltd, both based in Sydney, Australia. Mr. Miller was previously CFO at BlueArc, Digital Persona, Meridian Data and Parallan Computers, the last two of which he guided through successful IPOs. He also held senior finance positions with Granger-Telettra and Virtual Microsystems. Mr. Miller has deep understanding of technology and in addition to his financial responsibilities has often had executive responsibility for IT, Manufacturing and Customer Service throughout his career. He is a graduate of the University of California, Berkeley.
